wrapAndSwap().details: this function is called by MaticLinkSwap contract to wrap matic and launch a Uni v3 single swap

returns._0: amountOut the amount of token sent back after wrapping to wmatic and then swapping for bridged_Link

constructor.notice: Chainlink Price Feed Aggregator V3   Network: Polygon Mainnet Aggregator: Link/Matic Address: 0x12162c3E810393dEC01362aBf156D7ecf6159528

wrapAndSwap().notice: Uses IWmatic interface to deposit matic for wrapped matic, finally swaps wrapped matic for bridged_Link
